name: Star Citizen Gameboy Shipdex
description:
Show Room for Star Citizen ships  for the original Gameboy.

A demo of 7 Star Citizen ships you can experience on your Gameboy or Analogue Pocket. This is not a game, it's an interactive experience.

If you're playing in your PC's browser:

  • Cursors - Select manufacturer or move
  • Enter - Start
  • Shift - Select
  • Y/Z - A Button
  • X - B Button
